definition: Liangcheng county in Ulaanchab 烏蘭察布|乌兰察布[Wu1 lan2 cha2 bu4], Inner Mongolia

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: Maoqinggou cemetery was located in Liangcheng County, Inner Mongolia, dated back to the Eastern Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 毛慶溝墓地是內蒙古涼城縣東周時期的墓地。
